description:
＊ Phone Style, iScreen it! ＊

iScreen - personalized homescreen with various Widgets & Themes & Wallpaper to make your phone screen stand out!

*iOS 26 Unlocked​！, featuring liquid glass effects and over 1000+ 3D space wallpapers and themes. Added dynamic Control Center customization for a more practical and fun experience.

You can not only keep pets and grow plants on the Dynamic Island, customize your Lock Screen with Interactive, Weather, Battery, Launcher, X-Panel, Text & Icon, Animation, Work Clock, Step Count widgets, but also add Home Screen widgets like Dynamic Panel, Photos, Scrolling Album, To-Do List, Countdown, Digital Clock, Calendar, Emoji Notes, Fan, Air Conditioner, and more for greater fun. Besides widgets, iScreen also offers various Themes, Wallpapers, AI-generated artwork, Charging Animations, and other features to make your phone screen more beautiful and unique.

Special feature:  
【iOS 26】
Fun iOS 26 Features, customized with 1000+ 3D space wallpapers and themes. Added dynamic Control Center effects to make your phone truly one-of-a-kind!

【Control Center】
Customize your Control Center style with colorful icons. Features include a Counter, Water Reminder, Book of Answers, Dice Roll, and Quick Launch—combining beauty and practicality.

【DIY Wallpapers】
Create static or dynamic wallpapers with rich templates like Polaroid, Heart Puzzle, Flip Card, and Animated Marquee Lights to make your home screen unique.

【Widgets】
Includes popular widgets such as Dynamic Panel, Photo Wall, Weather, Battery, Countdown, Calendar, X-Panel, Emoji Notes, Digital Clock, Ferris Wheel, Windmill, and Air Conditioner. It also offers creative lock screen styles like Emojis, Animations, and Icons, with support for transparent effects — making your phone both fun and practical.

【Charging Animation】
Cool and interesting charging animations with custom effects for a personalized charging experience.

【Couple Widgets】
Sweet widgets designed for couples and friends. Send messages and photos to each other’s screens, and check real-time distance, weather, and moods.

【Interactive Widgets】
Quickly complete to-do check-ins or play games like Whack-a-Mole and Arcade without opening the app—adding fun to your daily routine.

【Themes & Wallpapers】
A vast collection of daily updated themes and wallpapers, including trending styles like Ins, minimalist, pink & black, AI art, and paper-cut designs. Easily elevate your home screen’s style and personalize your phone!

【Dynamic Island】
We offers a variety of fun features, such as Pet Island, Plant Island, Animation Island, Weather Island, Panel Island, Calendar Island, Signature Island, Launcher Island, Timer Island, and more. It comes with multiple built-in creative animations, and you can also custom upload images or avatars to your Dynamic Island and set exclusive quotes

Widgify spices up your phone screen with an array of cuttie widgets and thematic wallpapers. Tailored for iOS 17, it brings to the table cool new features like StandBy components and interactive widgets, injecting fun and personality into your phone!

Widgify offers a diverse mix of creative widgets and desktop themes, along with customizable editing options, allowing you to effortlessly craft a unique mobile desktop. Plus, get your very own virtual pet and enjoy the delight of pet ownership right on your phone!

【Exquisite Wallpaper】
Dive into a variety of mobile wallpaper styles like Instagram-inspired, artistic, minimalist, and new Chinese to add flair to your desktop. Plus, tap into the AI drawing feature to unleash your creativity for a truly personalized phone display.

Interact with your friends right from your home screen.

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

*ibisPaint's terms of service
https://ibispaint.com/agreement.jsp

Tattoo AI: Your Go-To App for Creating Unique Tattoos Effortlessly! Whether you’re a tattoo enthusiast, a first-timer considering getting inked, or a tattoo artist looking for inspiration, Tattoo AI has everything you need. With its cutting-edge AI tattoo generator and a range of styles from black & white to Japanese and tribal, you can create stunning tattoo designs for any part of your body in just a few taps.

Key Features:

AI Tattoo Generator:
Our AI tattoo generator is at the heart of Tattoo AI. Simply enter your ideas or themes, and our advanced AI will generate unique tattoo designs tailored to your preferences. It’s like having a personal tattoo artist in your pocket!

Diverse Style Options:
Tattoo AI offers a wide variety of styles to suit any taste. Whether you prefer the timeless elegance of black & white tattoos, the intricate details of Japanese art, or the bold creativity of gaming characters, you’ll find the perfect design here.

Text-Based Tattoos: Looking for a meaningful quote or phrase to ink? Tattoo AI allows you to create stunning text-based tattoos with customizable fonts and styles. Simply input your favorite words, and our AI will transform them into beautifully designed tattoos that resonate with your personality.

Full-Body Customization:
Design tattoos for any part of your body with ease. Our app allows you to visualize tattoos on various body parts, helping you see how the design will look before you commit.

High-Quality Tattoo Stencils:
Turn your designs into high-quality tattoo stencils. Perfect for tattoo artists or anyone who wants to bring their digital designs to life.

Save and Share:
Save your favorite designs and share them with friends or your tattoo artist. Get feedback, make adjustments, and finalize your perfect tattoo.

Why You’ll Love Tattoo AI:

Get Inspired:
Our AI tattoo generator gives you endless tattoo ideas. No more scrolling through generic images – get custom designs that reflect your style and personality.

Personalized Designs:
Every tattoo is unique. Tattoo AI creates personalized tattoo designs based on your inputs, making sure your tattoo is one of a kind.

Time-Saving:
Skip the hours of brainstorming and sketching. Let our AI do the heavy lifting, so you can focus on what matters – choosing and enjoying your new tattoo.

Easy Visualization:
Unsure about placement? Use our app to visualize how different designs look on different body parts. Make confident decisions about your tattoo’s size and location.

Artistic Freedom:
Whether you’re a tattoo artist or a tattoo lover, Tattoo AI provides tools that inspire creativity and allow you to explore endless possibilities.

Solve Your Tattoo Dilemmas:

Finding the perfect tattoo design can be overwhelming. Tattoo AI simplifies the process by generating designs that match your ideas and style preferences. Whether you’re looking for inspiration or a final design, our app takes the guesswork out of tattoo creation.

Unlock Your Tattoo Potential:

Tattoo AI is more than just a tattoo maker app – it’s a creative hub for tattoo enthusiasts. Our AI tattoo generator and extensive design options empower you to create tattoos that are truly yours. Whether you want a small tattoo or a full sleeve, Tattoo AI is the perfect companion for your tattoo journey.

To use this app, you must agree to our Privacy Policy, available at https://tattoo.ai/privacy

# Emojito: Redefine Your iMessage Communication Experience

In today's era of widespread instant messaging, emojis have become the core carrier of emotional expression. As a dedicated deep customization tool for iMessage, Emojito creates highly personalized chat scenarios for users with innovative features and massive resources.

+ Emoji Guess: Send emojis to friends and guess their meanings!
+ Nameoji: Find emojis in your name and refresh your cute name!

Emojito boasts an extensive library of high-quality sticker resources, covering diverse categories such as cute pets, funny expressions, holiday-exclusive themes, and trendy fashion elements. Whether for daily communication, life sharing, or emotional expression, you can quickly find stickers that fit the scenario. Each sticker is meticulously designed with rich details and unique styles, making text conversations more vivid and accurately conveying users' emotions.

## AI-Powered Exclusive Emoji Customization
Leveraging cutting-edge AI technology, Emojito achieves a breakthrough emoji customization function. After uploading a personal photo, the AI will accurately capture facial expressions and style characteristics to instantly generate exclusive emoji stickers. From playful looks to gentle smiles, subtle emotions can be transformed into unique personalized emojis, helping users showcase their personality and add a distinct touch to conversations.

Emojito adds a DIY wallpaper feature, helping users easily build an exclusive visual atmosphere. It comes with a large number of popular wallpaper templates, covering trendy styles such as healing landscapes, minimalist lines, retro comics, and dynamic gradients. By uploading personal materials, adding sticker elements, or adjusting color schemes, you can generate wallpapers that match your personal aesthetic with one tap, suitable for chat backgrounds or mobile phone desktops, showcasing your unique taste at all times.
